about_the_game:
RISE UP

The village is under threat as monsters begin to emerge from the forest. Only you, Ninjabun can stop them!



This top-down action Roguelite is inspired by the classics will take you on a thrilling adventure where your skills and determination will be tested! Hack, Slash, Dodge and Dash your way through endless enemies to protect your village and go for the high score!



Seek the help of villagers to aid you on your quest! Out in the forest, find ninja scrolls to obtain the power to vanquish your enemy!
